name: Quintessence Quartet
body:
### Barbershop Harmony, Refined
Quintessence is a male _a cappella_ quartet dedicated to the fine art of barbershop and other close harmony choral styles. Our name brings to mind that special moment when all the notes in a chord are sung just right and the harmonic resonance produces a fifth note or overtone, as well as the medieval alchemists who sought the rare "fifth element" that could turn crude metals into gold.

### Quartet Members
* Preston Brown (tenor)
* Mark Andromidas (lead)
* McKay Perkins (baritone)
* Carl Youngblood (bass)

### Contact
We can help make your event unforgettable. Hire us today!

contact@quintessence-quartet.com
+1-801-937-4461
